ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: Built-in 1/3 inch SONY CCD, color DSP. Signal System: NTSC
Horizontal Resolution: 600 TV lines. Lens: 3.6 mm wide angle
IR Illuminators: 20 IR LEDs. Minimum Illumination: 0.0 lux. IR Range: 65 feet
Heavy duty aluminum construction for outdoor indoor applications. Can be mount on wall or ceiling
Package includes: 1 x security dome camera, 1 x 12V DC 500mA power supply, 1 x video power cable and 1 x bonus security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Built-in 1/3" Sony CCD 600TVL Dome Security Camera Outdoor Vandal Proof Day Night IR Infrared Wide Angle for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with Power Supply and Extension Cable 3A8
